name: Cell Machine Indev
description: Get ready for the ultimate 2D sandbox puzzle game experience with Cell Machine: Indev!

name: Circuit Breakout: Dual Polarity
description: Unravel the mysteries of a derelict facility as you control two characters with unique abilities simultaneously in this thought-provoking 3D puzzle adventure.

name: Gerda: A Flame in Winter - Liva's Story
description: Become the leader your team needs you to be in Liva's Story. Play as Liva - the Sparrow - after she and her small group of Resistance members are forced to flee Copenhagen and retreat to the small village of Tinglev.

name: Lord of the Click: Interstellar Wars
description: Let's do it once more, people! New chapter of the critically acclaimed Lord of the Click series is finally here. And it's tetralogy now meaning we're done with the trilogy thing and up for something bigger. Interstellar Wars take the neverending conflict to a whole new level — in space!

name: Raventure
description: In Raventure, you play as a brave warrior on a perilous journey across a scorching desert.

name: Meteorite Miner
description: Meteorite MinerIn this thrilling 2D space mining game, you'll take on the role of a daring asteroid miner. Armed with your trusty mining laser, you'll blast through space rocks to extract valuable minerals and resources.

name: Presences: Dark Awakening
description: Explore a dark reality, discover a forgotten ritual, interact with the world around you, solve ancient puzzles, platform treacherous underground chambers, and feel the terror. Survive the night in this interactive haunted house narrative adventure from a first-person perspective.

name: Sex Simulator: BDSM Girls
description: An interactive sex simulation game with visual novel elements, featuring high definition graphics and videos, with realistic-looking characters set in a beautiful decor. You play the role of an experienced Mistress who initiates three lucky women into the world of BDSM sex.

name: Triad Ball
description: In NeoFuturistTown, anarchy reigns. The underworld barons have taken control and are fighting for territory. To put an end to these confrontations, a brilliant inventor proposed to settle the conflicts by triad matches. A sport created by this man of science.

name: Degroid
description:
The game tells the story of a little man named Degroid, who was caught by Mad Doctor. He had gone crazy during his experiments with teleportation.

A player will have to pass the obstacle course to get to the perpetrator of his imprisonment and get out of this endless madness. On the way there will be loads of circular saws, thorns, aggressive slugs, lasers and other lethal obstacles.

Because of teleports, carrying the Degroid`s body between levels, a player acquires immortality, resurrecting after every defeat.

Will he become mad too after countless deaths?

name: Tilting Tiles: Micro Challenge
description: Tilting Tiles: Micro Challenge is the third installment in the Tilting Tiles series. Micro Challenge brings an entire new take on the unique puzzle series by adding new player movement options and new terrain tiles. Whether you are a fan of the series or a first time player, this is the perfect place to start.

name: Wobbledogs: Console Edition
description: Raise your own hive of mutating dogs, physically simulated down to their guts!

name: True Survivors Bundle
description: Jump into Dying Light franchise with the latest bundle encompassing both installments.

name: Round People
description: "Round People" is a local multiplayer game where up to four players can battle it out on a trap-filled pool table. Strategy and action are key in this game.

name: Korokoro Harley
description:
The world's most "edgy" action game has arrived!
The hedgehog "Harley" who rolls and puts out a needle, unfolds a great adventure!

name: Pinball vs. Solitaire
description:
Welcome to Pinball Vs Solitaire!
A unique arcade card-game.
Use pinballs to collect cards and complete a solitaire deck.
Merges a classic card-game with iconic pinball mechanics.

name: Narcos: Idle Cartel
description:
When you find yourself partnered with El Patrón, the legendary smuggler, you’ll discover just how dangerous and seductive his world can be. Will you keep your hands clean or will you do whatever is needed to survive and thrive?
In this idle clicker game, you decide who becomes the ultimate business tycoon. Form alliances and rake in the idle money. You’re the jefe in this idle game and it’s your job to manage the production, distribution, and profit of the business. Become a billionaire by expanding your cartel business, tapping to build the best product. Experience the thrilling cartel life in Narcos: Idle Cartel!

name: Kawaii Mansion: Home Makeover
description: Loving cute game art and enjoy the pleasure of finding hidden objects in pretty scenes? Kawaii Mansion is the perfect fit for you! Tag along with Noah - a charming landlord who will guide you through the best home design experience as you discover the guests' stories through your distinctive mansion design. Let's get creative, shall we?

name: Ghost Blast
description:
A beautiful match 3 puzzle game starring ghosts!
Leave the dusty halls of an abandoned clock tower to haunt your way through a town in the dead of night! Will you be able to enjoy the ghost and reclaim what has been lost, before the night is over?
Make the most scary combinations and get through challenging levels full of fun! Smash ghost together and match the rarest treats to feed your spiders.

name: EvoPet
description:
EvoPet is a spiritual successor to the original VPet (virtual Pet) devices from the 90’s.
Hatch and collect multiple pet monster’s to raise, train and achieve a Mega evolution. Discover the various deck combinations and, through employing card strategy, be the ultimate champion.

name: Dont Touch Your Face
description:
Did you ever notice how many times do you touch your face in a day? Not even that long, in one minute. More important than that, how long can you go without doing it?
Don't Touch Your Face is a game about this simple, yet seemingly unachievable goal. It's simple and fast, you'll need concentration and discipline, as well as nimble fingers.

name: Minion Shooter
description: Protect the last coffee plant in the world from alien monsters with your custom fruit gun as the hero of Smash Anarchy! Collect coins & power ups while battling a plethora of creatures in an expansive new world with vibrant colors & engaging content! Strap in for compelling FPS gameplay that will keep you on the edge of your sofa, seat or wherever you choose to play!

name: MoonBeam
description: ‘Moonbeam' will bring you a brand new tower defense game experience. You will enter a magical world made up of sun birds and ice cream. In this world, you will need to use careful analysis and strategic placement of various weapons to experience the fun of defeating enemies and gaining resources.

name: Blind Bullet
description: Shoot towards darkness.Blind Bullet is a top-down 2D shooting game.You're blind in this game.You can see around by echolocation with your footstep sound.This game is under development.You can play by the end of Chapter 1 with demo version.Full version will also be available for free.

name: Inﬁnite Borders
description:
In the last years of the East Han period, when the flames of war are not ending in Coveting the World, the scoundrels from all over the world are scattered like stars in the central land, so only a true hero can rule in this three kingdom turmoil.
Here are the most realistic war scenes. Three hundred masters of the Three Kingdoms await your dispatch, and the combination of weapons and tactics has infinite possibilities. You can rule the territory with all your might to advance the construction of internal affairs, and you can use all your resources to colonize the territory.

name: Dunk City Dynasty
description: It's the hottest basketball game out, with gameplay deeper than you'd think!

name: The World of Kung Fu: Dragon and Eagle
description: A nostalgic pixel RPG that tells a Wuxia fantasy set in ancient China. You will start as a no-name wayfarer in a world of Kungfu, acquaint yourself with journeymen from feuding clans and sects, learn different schools of martial arts, and eventually make your own name at the crossroads of times.

name: Petrovich and all, all, all...
description: A humorous point & click game based on Andrei Bilzho's caricatures. The game introduces us to how and what that same Petrovich and other historical figures live on today. At 25 levels of the game we meet Pushkin, Grandfather Mazai, Chapaev, Kolobok, aliens and many other characters.

name: Haishan
description: "Haishan" is a traditional Chinese-style cultivation roguelite game. Set in a world where the revival of spiritual Qi has awakened demons that wreak havoc on the modern world, you traverse ancient realms with the aid of the "Kunlun Mirror," embarking on a journey of cultivation.

name: Peculiarities of National Fishing
description: "Peculiarities of National Fishing" is a Puzzle/Arcade game based on the popular 1998's STV TV movie of the same name.

name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate: Waluigi Moveset
description: A custom moveset mod for Super Smash Bros. Ultimate which adds in Waluigi into the game.

name: Damn Daniel
description: See how far you can run while helping Daniel get different pairs of vans!

name: How the Cossacks searched for Mona Lisa
description: A Ukrainian point & click adventure game. It is based on cartoons made in the USSR at the KievNauchFilm film studio by director Vladimir Dakhno.

name: Johnny Trigger: Sniper
description:
Take aim - headshot! Take aim - headshot! What could be more satisfying?

You play as a professional assassin with style, guts and an awesome rifle. Your opponents aren't beaten in the dark either and they can bite back, but you've got enough bullets in your magazine: pick a target, aim, headshot! Way to go!

Earn money for missions to unlock new guns, rocket launchers and even assault rifles. Collect keys to open mysterious suitcases. Shoot exploding barrels, defeat mafia bosses and make sure innocent civilians don't get hurt.

name: Assassin's Creed Unity: Revolutionary Armaments Pack
description: Arm yourself for the revolution!

name: Dawn of Tank
description: Dawn of Tank is an action-strategy game made in Greenfoot.

name: Touhou Hyakki Kasen
description: "Touhou Hyakki Kassen" (English: Eastern One Hundred Ogre Battle) is a real time strategy and tower defense game in which players place their units and face waves of enemies. As commander Reimu or Suika the players can select three kinds of units: Walking (very basic but flexible, they move in any direction), Barrage (they attack from distance) and Flying (fast, life bar and damage are various). Each unit is disposable and players can increase their deck level by synthesizing existing cards or collecting new ones each time they win a mission. Touhou Hyakki Kassen is the 10th official game from Strawberry Bose.

name: Touhou Monsters Card - Phantasmal Summoner
description: In Gensokyo magic is considered outdated and people are starting to use monsters in battle. Developed using same game engine as Touhou Soujinengi, Touhou Monsters Card is a mini RPG where the player will travel to various places and dungeons to collect more than 400 monster cards. The battle system shares similar mechanics with the Saga and Pokemon series. When there are no monsters in a player's field, they'll receive a direct attack. Monster cards can be obtained by winning battles or exploring available locations. The developer also provided online features and allows player to duel via their Twitter account.

name: Touhou Quest: Mugen no Spellcard
description: Suddenly, a mysterious fog rolls in and releases hordes of monsters from the dungeons. Accompanied by a group of party members, Reimu is out to save the land from peril. Mugen no Spellcard, literally translated as Spellcard of Infinity, is a traditional turn-based RPG, influenced by SaGa Series and Dragon Quest. Players control a party of characters that can walk into towns and buy items to defeat monsters outside of the towns. Touhou Quest features a skill tree, a tiered skill system that typically branches out into multiple paths, giving the character the ability to perform a new action or giving a boost to one of the character's stats. Skill trees also affect characters attributes such as magic points, weapons, gold, etc. The weapon synthesis system from Touhou Soujinengi is back, so that players can forge stronger weapons.

name: Touhou Battle Raiders
description:
Suddenly, numerous monsters appear and Gensokyo is once again in danger of destruction.
Touhou Battle Raiders is a strategy RPG developed by four doujin circles; Hachimitsu Kumasan, AQUA STYLE, Strawberry Bose and Kanagawa Denshi Gijutsu Kenkyuujo. Through the campaign, the player retains control of four characters, across a battlefield against hordes of enemy forces in real-time with boss battles at the end of each round. In the campaign the player must complete the main objective to proceed to the next chapter, but there are also optional routes which can be completed alongside the main quests with rare items as reward. In between battles, players can access their characters to equip them with purchased goods or items gained from previous adventures.

name: Touhou Eiyuu Musou
description: Touhou Eiyuu Musou (English: Eastern Heroes Unrivalled) is the second game, developed by Kanagawa Denshi Gijutsu Kenkyuujo and Strawberry Bose, and based upon Shin Sangokumusou a series of action games created by Omega Force and Koei. Similar to Shin Touhou Musou, there is no specific storyline and the player chooses one of 12 playable characters, explore 50 stages going after fairies, kedamas, UFOs and a powerful boss that awaits every five stages. Each level has different terrain and random enemies. As the player collects more point items and experience, new skills can be unlocked. The game also supports two player cooperative mode via network feature.

name: Touhou Genmu Youtan: The Nightmare of Rebellion
description: Touhou Genmu Youtan: The Nightmare of Rebellion is the third game of Strawberry Bose's trilogy. It basically uses improved materials from it's predecessor Devil of Decline. All graphics and effect have been completely renewed and are greatly improved. The game features five playable main characters, which all participate in battle.

name: Löwenzahn 2: Geschichten aus Natur, Umwelt und Technik
description: The second installment of the educational game series based on the German TV show 'Löwenzahn'. The game teaches kids about nature, economy and technical aspects of the world.

name: Escape from Puppy Death Factory
description: Escape From Puppy Death Factory is an action-puzzle platformer released by Adult Swim Arcade.

name: Grim Tales: Color of Fright - Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Grim Tales: Graywitch
description: While researching her family’s history, your friend was pulled back in time! It’s up to you to travel into the past to find her, but it won’t be easy. There’s a mysterious monster on the prowl and the town’s history remains a mystery. Can you uncover the identity of the monster and rescue your friend in time?

name: Nuclear Titbit 2
description: Russian adventure point & click game. The second game released by Buka Entertainment under the brand name "Byaka" ("Бяка"), specially created for this kind of games. The idea and scenario of the game belong to Daniil Shepovalov.

name: Grim Tales: The White Lady - Collector's Edition
description: Your nephew and his friend have gone missing from Evergreen Boarding School! Your only lead is that both children recently mentioned seeing the apparition of a lady in white. Can you uncover the secrets hiding in the boarding school, or will you fall prey to the spirits inside?

name: Grim Tales: The Hunger
description: Your niece Jackie Gray has been murdered by a killer whose crimes went unsolved 17 years ago. Team up with Jackie's policeman father and use your powers to go back in time and stop the killer before their murder spree claims Jackie's life in the present! Will you be able to solve the cold case, or will the killer rise again to begin another reign of terror? Travel into the past to find all the clues – and the villain!

name: Grim Tales: The Hunger - Collector's Edition
description: Your niece Jackie Gray has been murdered by a killer whose crimes went unsolved 17 years ago. Team up with Jackie's policeman father and use your powers to go back in time and stop the killer before their murder spree claims Jackie's life in the present! Will you be able to solve the cold case, or will the killer rise again to begin another reign of terror? Travel into the past to find all the clues – and the villain!

name: Nevsky Titbit
description: Russian action FPS game. The idea and script of the game belong to Daniil Shepovalov.

name: Spacejump
description: An unnamed undercover policeman is given a new task, to destroy all aliens on a secret planet.

name: Palm Tetris
description: Palm Tetris is a puzzle game built on various cubes of different colors that need to be decomposed so as to fill the entire void.

name: All is Fair in Love and Vore: The Tavorion Collection
description: Vore visual novel! Vore! Sex! Complex characters! Profound thoughts! Women! Well-researched historical settings! Cannibalism! Never before has it been so easy to play all 6 iconic masterpieces, now with extra content!

name: Supraworld
description: Supraworld is a first-person puzzle metroidvania. Be tiny in a handcrafted toy world. Explore, solve puzzles, ignore the main quest, get out of bounds, find secret areas, convict murderers. Hunt for powerful new abilities to unravel this vast, interconnected world… And don't forget to save the princess.

name: Moon Observatory Melanie
description:
Moon Observatory is a fantasy otome game series created by Batensan.
In the universe of MO, there are thirteen worlds named after months, with one final nameless world. Each world has a Magician, a half-immortal being who watches over their world's residents.

name: Wickie und die starken Männer: Die Mutprobe
description: Vicky wants to join the vikings on their next journey but the crew think he isn't ready yet. To prove how strong Vicky is he needs to beat some of the vikings into challenges, but since he isn't the strongest he needs to come up with clever ideas to win.

name: Oscar the Balloonist Discovers the Farm
description: Oscar is exploring the world and explores the farmland to discover and learn about animals and living on a farm.

name: Popgoes: Lost Dreams
description:
One year after the death of beloved inventor Fritz Glade, an old friend gets trapped in the abandoned pizzeria. Will she survive, or will she follow in the creator's footsteps?

Popgoes: Lost Dreams is a fanmade sequel to Popgoes by Kane Carter. The game features three different chapters, free-roam gameplay, new characters and a whole bunch of jumpscares.

name: Math Blaster Ages 6-8
description: Eight absorbing activities with five levels of content introduce addition, subtraction, and sorting of simple and complex number sets. Over 350 lessons and 1,000 problems and puzzles build operations and data skills, while exploration activities build visual and logical thinking skills. Progress reports and printable activities are included.

name: Die CD-ROM mit der Maus 1
description: Playing, learning, puzzling, drawing and making music with the Mouse and the Elephant.

name: Die CD-ROM mit der Maus 2
description: Playing, learning, puzzling, drawing and making music with the Mouse and the Elephant.

name: Die CD-ROM mit der Maus 3
description: Playing, learning, puzzling, drawing and making music with the Mouse and the Elephant.

name: Cave Chaos
description: Cave Chaos is a platforming game created by Nitrome. You're a miner whose goal is to escape a collapsing cave. Start running immediately and pick up the loot on your way before reaching the end of the level. Jump over the boxes swiftly but carefully to avoid falling alongside the rocks. Don't forget to make use of the power-ups such as double-jump, invincibility and bombs. There is so much to explore in Starfish Cove. Play Cave Chaos with a friend to maximize the fun!

name: LEGO Supersonic RC
description:
LEGO Supersonic RC is a supersonic racing game where you are in control of your LEGO RC race car!

Pass all of the yellow star checkpoints in time to earn max points and win the race.

Drive your way through the toy store and follow the yellow arrows for directions. Get some serious air when you hit the jumps in this great game!

name: The Dusk Alliance
description: The Dusk Alliance is a 1-4-player coop Action/Investigation horror game.

name: Fairgames
description: Welcome to Fairgames - your chance to rob the rich and rebalance the scales. Fairgame$ is a competitive modern heist game where you team up to break into exotic locations and steal the cargo. The twist? You not only need to outsmart guards and security systems - you also compete against other teams. Crews that extract with the most loot and flair might just rise to the top of Fairgames. Take it 'til you make it - who will you recruit first for your crew?

name: Helldivers 2
description: The Galaxy’s Last Line of Offence. Enlist in the Helldivers and join the fight for freedom across a hostile galaxy in a fast, frantic, and ferocious third-person shooter.

name: Ghostrunner II
description: Ghostrunner II is a hardcore FPP slasher set in a post-apocalyptic, cyberpunk world. Featuring everything fans loved about Ghostrunner plus incredible boss fights, new interactive story, thrilling motorbike levels, improved skills, and more cyber ninja action.

name: Phantom Blade 0
description:
Phantom Blade Zero is a an action RPG featuring deep and dark art style, fast paced combat, and a fictitious world blending Chinese martial arts and steampunk!
Be the Dark Raider exiled by "The Order", embark on the path of vengeance, and uncover the darkest secrets of Wulin!

name: Sword of the Sea
description: Surf across the surreal undulating landscapes of the Necropolis on a quest to unveil a lost ocean teeming with life in Sword of the Sea.

name: Neva
description:
Neva is an action-adventure game developed by Nomada Studio and published by Devolver Digital.
The gameplay combines side-scrolling platforming with environmental puzzles and combat.
Neva has been praised for its stunning art style, emotional storytelling, and refined gameplay mechanics, building upon the foundation laid by GRIS.

name: Cat Quest III
description: In Cat Quest III you play as a purrivateer in a freely explorable 2.5D open-world swarming with Pi-rats. You can sail the seas in your ship for treasures galore! But prepare for peril, as the Pirate King aims to hunt you down...

name: Foamstars
description:
A 4v4 online party shooter from Square Enix that has you battling to foam as much of the city as you can while avoiding your opponents traps and weapons.

Use foam to build terrain, creating slippery surfaces to surf around the arena at high speed, help defend from enemy attacks, or create vantage points to take out opponents.

And most importantly, to foam up the opposition!

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Revenant Hill
description: It’s 1919 and Twigs the cat has a dream. Find a safe place to sleep. Put down roots. Grow some radishes, get a job, eat mice, do dangerous things with new friends, and build something together in a world falling apart.

name: Ultros
description: Ultros is a psychedelic metroidvania where you wake up stranded on The Sarcophagus — a cosmic uterus holding an ancient, demonic being. Trapped in the loop of a black hole, you will have to explore The Sarcophagus and meet its inhabitants to understand the part you play...

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Help Wanted 2
description:
Find out if you have what it takes to be a Fazbear Entertainment Superstar!

Five Nights at Freddy’s: Help Wanted 2 is the sequel to the terrifying VR experience that brought new life to the iconic horror franchise. As a brand new Fazbear employee you’ll have to prove you have what it takes to excel in all aspects of Pizzeria management and maintenance.

name: Arizona Sunshine II
description: Dust off your shotgun and sharpen your machete. Accompanied by an all-new friend, Arizona Sunshine 2 takes you back to the limb-strewn deserts of post-apocalyptic Arizona in this gory, next-gen sequel to one of VR's most-played games.

name: Pokémon Edición Reloaded
description: A Pokémon fangame for windows that features real time battles. It is currently in development but has released multiple betas.

name: Marathon
description: A PvP-focused extraction shooter set on the mysterious planet of Tau Ceti IV, Marathon will see players inhabit the bodies of Runners, cybernetic mercenaries who have been designed to survive the planet’s harsh environments, exploring the lost colony that once inhabited Tau Ceti’s surface. Players will engage solo or in crews of three, searching for mysterious alien artifacts, as well as for valuable loot and new weapons and gear that they can add to their collection.

name: Concord
description: In Concord, you play as the crew of the Northstar—a group of guns-for-hire known in our galaxy as Freegunners. The Freegunners roam the stars taking high-stakes jobs on worlds across Wild space, where they face other fiercely competitive Freegunner crews. From match-to-match, you’ll form your team of Freegunners with other players and battle it out with rival crews to take home the reward across a variety of maps and modes.

name: Gotcha
description: A platformer where the goal is to escape prison by keeping out of sight of the guards.

name: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater
description: The same gripping story and engrossing world, but now with cutting-edge graphics and 3D audio, which bring the jungle to life. Get ready for the ultimate survival, stealth and action experience.

name: Metal Gear Solid Master Collection: Volume 1
description:
The origin of stealth action returns. Metal Gear Solid Master Collection: Volume 1 unifies the beginning of the Metal Gear gameplay experience in one single package. Infiltrate enemy fortresses all over the globe, complete your missions with stealth and experience the thrilling cinematic story of the Metal Gear series. Volume 1 line-up features the original titles and beginning of the Metal Gear series: Metal Gear, METAL GEAR (NES version), Metal Gear 2: Solid Snake, Snake's Revenge, Metal Gear Solid (Including VR Missions/Special Missions), Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty (HD Collection version), Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater (HD Collection version)

Title lineup
Metal Gear
Metal Gear 2: Solid Snake
Metal Gear Solid (Including VR Missions/Special Missions)
Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty (HD Collection version)
Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater (HD Collection version)
Metal Gear (NES/FC version)
Snake's Revenge

Regional versions of the titles are available as additional downloads.

[Video]
Metal Gear Solid: Digital Graphic Novel
Metal Gear Solid 2: Digital Graphic Novel

[Digital book]
Metal Gear Solid: Screenplay Book
Metal Gear Solid: Master Book
Metal Gear Solid 2: Screenplay Book
Metal Gear Solid 2: Master Book
Metal Gear Solid 3: Screenplay Book
Metal Gear Solid 3: Master Book
Metal Gear & Metal Gear 2: Screenplay Book
Metal Gear & Metal Gear 2: Master Book

The digital books can be accessed from the game's main menu screen.

[Soundtrack]
Metal Gear Solid: Digital Soundtrac

name: Towers of Aghasba
description: Towers of Aghasba, an open-world experience where players can build vast settlements and grow sprawling ecosystems on their fantasy island.

name: Headbangers Heaven
description: Chico the Headbanger has to mover bags from the right of the screen to the left while avoiding falling hammers.

name: Happy Aquarium
description: Happy Aquarium, is a real-time video game, developed by CrowdStar. The game was available from the social web Facebook. After Adobe Flash Player shut down and stopped producing updates on December 31, 2020, Facebook removed games that had Flash Player available, and Happy Aquarium was one of those games. The game made it possible to acquire, sell, feed, mate or train fish and other marine animals. The app was well known on the social web with millions of active users per month.

name: School Romance: Love or Lose
description: Your high school life is about to be anything but average—you just got accepted into one of the most prestigious schools in the country! But there’s a catch… In order to stay enrolled, you need to find a girlfriend before the end of the school year!

name: Total Upheaval
description:
Every decade, a list of the 100 Most Influential People is drafted up, with a heavy emphasis placed on those in the top 25. Dubbed MIRS (Most Influential 25) by the general populace, these selected few are invited to a conference by NEXT, the world's leading megacorporation. While the public eye becomes fixated on the NEXT World Conference, no one except the attendees will ever learn what happened behind these closed doors.

This leads to the conference becoming hijacked by an unknown party. Kidnapped, the attendees are whisked away to an abandoned university. Everyone wakes up discombobulated. Once bearings are found and introductions are made, the school's unusual principal finally reveals himself: Kingpen, the Crowned Al-Capone Penguin. Despite his cuddly looks, he thrusts the entire group into a no holds barred killing game.

Who will die? Who will survive? Who is pulling the strings? Why a penguin!?

name: Back Rooms: Ground Zero
description:
A Backrooms fangame.

Traverse the backrooms like it's 1986, in my game inspired by Famicom visual novels and adventure games.
Move room to room, in hopes of finding anything. And discover if there was ever a way out to begin with.

name: Saltwater Shells
description: Play as Loke, a small kid from a small island helping your mom collect shells for the decorations in the upcoming town festival. Collect shells, a pogo stick, and other items to help you get as many shells as you can! Explore the island and talk to everyone, they'll help you reach that perfect score!

name: Resident Evil 4: VR Mode
description:
Experience the ultimate immersive experience as Leon S. Kennedy takes on a grueling rescue mission!

Resident Evil 4 is a remake of the 2005 original Resident Evil 4 reimagined for 2023 to bring state-of-the-art survival horror. Resident Evil 4 preserves the essence of the original game, while introducing modernized gameplay, a reimagined storyline,
and vividly detailed graphics to make this the latest survival horror game where life and death, terror and catharsis intersect.

name: Destiny 2: The Final Shape
description: The Final Shape looms—a nightmarish calcification of reality into the Witness's twisted design. Embark on a perilous journey into the heart of the Traveler, rally the Vanguard, and end the War of Light and Darkness.

name: Beat Saber: Queen Music Pack
description:
Beat Games studio brings fresh beats from Queen to Beat Saber! Dive into the pulsing music of Queen and slash the beats in our brand new Queen Music Pack. See you on the leaderboards!

Queen Music Pack includes the tracks:

Another One Bites the Dust
Bohemian Rhapsody
Crazy Little Thing Called Love
Don’t Stop Me Now
I Want It All
Killer Queen
One Vision
Somebody to Love
Stone Cold Crazy
We Are The Champions
We Will Rock You

name: City Slickers
description: Welcome to City Slickers, the ultimate co-op sandbox game for you and up to 4 friends! Immerse yourself in a bustling city filled with cars, planes, boats, and NPCs, and let your imagination run wild with a cute physics-based active-ragdoll character!

name: Magic Paper
description: Magic Paper is a hack and slash roguelike game in which you can build your own set of magics to use.

name: Shop-Like: The Rogue-Like Item Shop Experience
description: An Item-Shop Game meets the concept of roguelikes! Endless Replayability and countless options to victory are awaiting you in Shop-Like! Shop-Like is all about running a business in order to pay your debts, so you will not land in the brutal hands of debt slavery.

name: Grab the Goblins!
description: Grab the Goblins! is a charming hidden object game where you need to find tiny goblins to stop them running amok!

name: Cataclysm
description: Breach the Sinner's Paradise as the Aztec god of death, Mictian, and kill all angels.

name: Everdream Valley: GOG Exclusive DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Cult of the Lamb: Heretic Edition
description:
The Heretic Edition of Cult of the Lamb includes:
- The base game
- The Heretic pack
- The Cultist pack

name: Travel Cuisine: Collector's Edition
description: Tammy and Matthew dream of owning their own restaurant! But how can you achieve your dreams without the much-needed experience and capital? The culinary tournament is the solution to all problems.

name: Alchemy Dungeon
description:
Alchemy Dungeon is a mix of puzzle and roguelike. Your goal is to merge items, discover new recipes, explore endless dungeons, slay monsters and find treasures. Your best scores are used to unlock unique characters, powers, and levels, and the loot you find is used for upgrades.
The game is simple to learn but hard to master. It is offline and is designed for one-hand operation.

name: Speed Bike Racing
description: You are a speed bike racer, and the legendary MotoX motorcycle race is closely approaching. You have decided to test your skills before the big event. The goal is to ride as far as you can in total meters, before you crash your bike. The further you go, the more prestige and famous you become.

name: Deep Golf
description:
Golf down through the Earth. Billions of procedurally generated holes, every game and device is different. Play to the center of the Earth and see what you find along the way. Replay with all new holes.
How deep can you go?
Touch and drag to shoot. Tilt to add some spin. Put the ball in the hole.
Play anywhere on your Apple Watch.
Instantly try or share Deep Golf with its AppClip. Even save the AppClip onto an NFC Tag.
I hate ads too. So there aren't any. You can upgrade to play with much longer courses, and use any ball before unlocking it with holes-in-one.
Upgrade to also play with some fun Physics. Bouncier? Stickier? Mixed with a Square golf ball? Upgrade to mix and match.

name: Juggle Struggle
description:
Juggle Struggle is a fast paced arcade jumper where you have to juggle the ball in the air under extreme conditions, as you try to avoid all incoming obstacles to become the Juggle Champion!
Compete against the world and your friends in 15 unique challenging stages.
The game features 36 different balls, ranging from basic sports balls (football, baseball, tennis ball, basketball etc), to more crazy balls like the sun, a disco ball, a slime ball, an atom or even a skull!
All balls have their own physic properties and you have to find the right ball, which fits your style of gameplay to beat the stages.
So, what are you waiting for? Enter the arena and become the juggle champion!

name: Basketball Arcade Stars
description:
How many baskets can you score in 40 seconds?
Basketball Arcade Stars is an addictive game designed for real basketball fans of all ages.

name: Compulsive
description: A palette of beautiful colors needs your help to get organized. This quick color matching puzzle game is easy to learn and difficult to put down. Ready to get Compulsive?

name: The Epic Quest of Birdo The Pink Dinosaur
description:
Play as Birdo the pink dinosaur and help her free yoshi from the evil wart, who is trying to cook yoshi´s eggs!
Travel through the world and defeat SMB1,SMB2 and SMB3 characters. Drive on a rollercoaster, jump around in space and visit wart´s personal swamp. Buy something from the shop to make you more powerfull! Find secrets in every level. And defeat the bosses from SMB2, who have sworn themself against birdo.

name: Rock Band Sessions
description: Rock Band Sessions was a cancelled entry in the Rock Band series that was intended to be a sequel to Rock Band 3, however was scrapped during development. The game would've had a focus on the composition of music. Gameplay of the cancelled game was later shown off by IGN on May 12, 2015.

name: Rock Band: Japan
description: Rock Band: Japan is a cancelled spinoff game in the Rock Band series. The game was intended to feature various songs from Japanese artists, alongside some Western songs. The game was cancelled due to licensing difficulties with Japanese songs and the cost of manufacturing the controllers for a Japanese audience.

name: Led Zeppelin: Rock Band
description: Led Zeppelin: Rock Band was a cancelled spin off for the Rock Band series based around the band Led Zeppelin. The game never got far in development before being cancelled.

name: Monkeet
description:
Your sole means of movement is yeeting yourself through the air!
Forget about mundane monke stuff like boring walking or the slightly less boring swinging gracefully from tree to tree. No no no, we're talking monke mobility to a whole new level here!

name: UnovaRPG
description: This MMORPG Pokemon online game is based on the Pokémon Indigo platform. Start capturing wild Pokemon on this MMORPG (X & Y and all generations available), set up your team with up to 6 of them and start battling online with more than +1,000,000 Pokemon Trainers from around the world! Meet new friends (and foes) and show that your team is the best on the battlefield!

name: Fevirre's CT Pack
description: Fevirre's CT Pack is a custom track distribution for Mario Kart 8: Deluxe that adds in various retro tracks into the game.

name: Mutiny
description: Mutiny is a strategy game released July 8, 2008. The player takes on the role of pirates fighting against other sea-bound enemies using various weapons- most of which come in limited quantities. An HTML5 port of the game was released on Nitrome.com on April 30th-May 1st, 2021.

name: Pokengine
description:
A Pokémon MMO currently in open beta containing multiple fanmade regions and fakemon. In addition to the MMO, Pokéngine contains robust tools that allow you to design, build, and code your very own Region right inside your web browser using our custom language, JCoad.

The game currently contains multiple regions with their respective storylines like Rica, Borovia and Easter Island.

name: Exerion II: Zorni
description: Cancelled NES port of Exerion II.

name: Mr. Potato Head: School Rush
description: When Mr. Potato Head: School Rush tries to get you to school on time, you can expect as many twists and turns as the number of detachable parts on his body! An exciting, interactive saga awaits when you try to keep Mr. Potato Head: School Rush in one piece!

name: Woodcutter
description: Woodcutter is a VR simulator that makes everyone feel like a real carpenter. The simulator reproduces the main stages of the production of window architraves: creating a workpiece blank, choosing the shape of the future architraves, sawing, milling, painting, etc.

name: Lover Simulator2
description: A love simulation game with a driven storyline, featuring a plethora of unique dating scenes, individual character storylines, and casual gameplay to pass the time

name: I Want to Be a Werewolf
description: "I Want to Be a Werewolf" is a text-based adventure where you can enjoy the detective elements of the Werewolf game and the stories of the characters.A strange room when you wake up. "werewolf game" that starts without knowing the purpose. Mystery & suspense that sees through deception.

name: Volcano Planet
description: This game is a score attack type game where you rotate the volcano star with the [W][A][D] keys and destroy the meteorite with the lava part to earn a score.If a non-volcanic part of the star hits the meteorite, it will be a miss. Earn a score before you miss.

name: Panic in Sweets Land
description: Crushing combos and beat up enemies! No complicated controls, just fun with a variety of fighting actions! The joy and faults of a pretty magical girl knocking down her enemies? Yes, please! A delicious and crazy action game with bright and colorful sweet action!

name: Zombie Runner
description: Zombie runner - 3D runner with a third-person view in which you have to control one of the undead. Run as far as possible while collecting as many brains as possible. Beat your own records on the way to perfection and prove to everyone that you are the most persistent zombie of all!

name: Yard Sale Simulator
description: An open world yard sale simulator. Buy, repair and sell your way to the top. Shop yard sales, hold your own yard sale, buy a market stand, upgrade your stand or open a shop in town to sell all your newly acquired valuables.

name: Your Spaceport!
description: Manage your very own space station in this Tycoon game. Sell fuel and repairs to the visitors. Manufacture and research new ways to defend your business and make more money. Survive against all odds.

name: GunGuru
description: A game made by a real world US Marine Veteran Machine-gunner. Explore the ever evolving jungle of GunGuru, an ancient procedurally generated environment, full of magic and mystery. Unlock the secret of the Runes and find out what is hidden beneath.

name: Block Tower TD
description: Block Tower TD is a roguelike tower defense strategy game with interesting innovations. Build a world out of blocks, choose random upgrades to make every run unique.

name: Black Finger Jet
description: "Black Finger JET" is a Run&Gun game. This is a completely new game from a team that has released many action shooting games.

name: Bite Size Terrors: Erobos Heaven
description: Unsettling & Disturbing Events Quickly Rise After Being Saved By God.

name: Finesse
description: Jump your way to glory in this gravity-defying arcade platformer. Lasers attack the player from all sides, high and low, at merciless speeds. With well-timed moves, however, they zoom by without leaving a scratch. Survive to win fans, prizes, and more opportunities to dodge things.

name: Finding America: The West
description: Explore the West and uncover its hidden gems through the excitement of finding fun objects.

name: Feather Party
description: Welcome to the fantastic party on the adorable planet of chicks! Feather Party is a multiplayer party game for up to 8 players. Engage in a diverse array of fun mini-games with friends or against rivals to be the winner of this party!

name: FallinBara
description: In this journey where we go deeper with our character dedicated to cutting enemies with the swords he holds in both hands, we not only cut the enemies we encounter, but also try to pass the obstacles we encounter with our agile movements.

name: Ezerath's Last Hope
description: A dungeon crawler, beat em' up RPG with an open world for you to explore.

name: Freelancer Simulator
description: You earn money by doing various kinds of work that you receive as a "Freelance" over the computer. With the money you earn, you can customize the house, improve yourself, have fun and more.

name: Werewolf: The Apocalypse - The Book of Hungry Names
description: Save the living earth with Rage and spirit! Awaken ancient mysteries, rebuild your fallen pack, and unleash your fearsome might to heal a shattered land. A text-based interactive novel set in the World of Darkness.

name: Dein Sportpferd
description: Learn how to take care of a horse, ride horses and solve puzzles.

name: Valden Saga
description: Valden Saga is a first-person action game in which you take on the role of a royal guard sent to unravel the cause of disasters in one of the kingdom's provinces.

name: Budget Cuts Ultimate
description:
Zip, sneak, and stab your way through a heart-pounding dystopia filled with evil robots! What began as a cost-cutting strategy has spiraled out of control, and now it’s up to you to save humanity from being optimized out of existence. Budget Cuts Ultimate is the essential VR action stealth game, containing all previously released games and content updates.

As your last human co-worker is hauled away, a mysterious briefcase from someone on the outside is delivered to your desk. You need to get to the bottom of what is going on at TransCorp.

Sneak around enemy robots by climbing through air ducts and service tunnels, or embrace violence by unleashing a fistful of knives, quivers of arrows, grenades, and coffee mugs onto their unsuspecting circuits. Once you’ve completed your mission, test your skills in the arcade with multiple modes, difficulty levels, and scoring.

name: Fallout: Oblivion Lost
description: "Oblivion Lost" is a crossover of the Fallout franchise and the S.T.A.L.K.E.R. franchise built on the Fallout 2 engine.

name: Freak Hunter A Retro Type
description: Freak Hunter A Retro Type is a very fun platform game. Kill all creatures and complete the level. The more creatures you kill, the more points you get. But check the ammo of your gun because when it runs out you will have to use a knife.

name: Project CarnEvil
description: Project CarnEvil, the ultimate VR horror experience, invites you to confront your fears. This game will test you to your limits with difficult carnival games and a crazed clown to banish. Will you be able to overcome your fear and escape alive?

name: Shambles
description: “The world you once knew is gone.”Leave your bunker and explore a world that’s gone through 500 years of change. Witness countless stories and intriguing events with your own two eyes. Will you bring peace to the world outside? Or march it towards its ruin? Everything is up to you.

name: Too Many Cooks
description: Fired and blackballed by Chef Hamsey, you are a chef looking to find your next position. Unfortunately, the employees of any restaurant you walk into want you dead! Fight off hordes of enemies while upgrading through a food-themed upgrade tree.

name: Bumpy Grumpy
description: You’ve lost your papers and are late to work! Race through packed streets and zip by hordes of wacky drivers. Make sure to brake carefully at every traffic light–or just jam on the gas! Nab powerups, snatch your papers, and boost your way to a new high score.

name: Mechanical Fury
description: Your arm has been replaced with a grappling hook, courtesy of the Machine Army. Return the favor with total annihilation. Grapple. Kick, and DESTROY everything that stands in your way!

name: Cavera: The Island of Apes
description: Cavera - Island of Apes: top vacation spot for Apes and degens. Socialize, dance with up to 99 others. Explore, swim, chill on this multiplayer game.

name: Venture to the Vile
description: Your life is plunged into disarray by a monstrous entity known as “the Vile”. With the town in shambles and your arm left blackened by the Vile, you discover that your best friend, Luella, is also missing. Will you save the town and find Luella — or will you give in to the monster you've become?

name: Voxel Miner: Dwellers of The Deep
description: Voxel Miner: Dwellers of the Deep, is a single player game where you mine resources to upgrade different skills, abilities, and fight the creatures you come across along the way! Strategize your upgrades, fight monsters, or just sit back and enjoy the satisfying mechanics. The choice is yours...

name: Avalanca
description: As you make your way down the mountain, you'll encounter a variety of challenges that will test your skill and reflexes. Jump over cliffs, weave through trees, and grind along rails as you try to stay one step ahead of the danger.

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator: Aquariums DLC
description: Upgrade your fishing game with the latest addon - Aquariums DLC. Add up to 7 large fish tanks to showcase your catches in the new Trophy Room. Choose the water type, interior design, name your tank, and show off your personalized aquarium to friends and family.

name: Roots of the Mind
description: Brave the dangerous world of the small insects that suffered from the attack of the mind-bending roots.

name: The Malice Kingdom
description: Explore an ancient world in The Malice Kingdom. Travel the rich and diverse landscape filled with ancient ruins, foreboding forests, and haunting mansions. Discover powerful weapons, befriend Whimsical characters, and uncover the dormant secret within the kingdom.

name: Ultimate Speed Run
description: Simple, clean and fun, Ultimate Speed Run is a test of your gaming ability. It will push you to the max and not let you relax! There is no 'chance' in this game, it is all down to your skill as a gamer! Take the test... be the best, be the Ultimate Speed Runner!

name: Furia de Weichafes
description: Welcome to the Wallmapu Tournament: Fury of Weichafes, fight your way to be the tournament Winner

name: Bus Simulator 23
description: Drive your daily bus route and reconnect with an old friend

name: The Land Past Redemption
description: The Land Past Redemption is a medieval, turn-based combat, rogue-lite. Take on bounties, recruit more heroes, get better loot, and earn enough gold to pay your way out of the Land Past Redemption.

name: Melvin finds home
description: Melvin the teddy is lost in the woods after camping. Help him find his way home!

name: Totem Destroyer
description: Totem Destroyer - A game in the physical world where the player has to destroy wooden objects while keeping the totem above the fire, preventing it from approaching the flames.

name: Fortune Miles Away
description: Fortunes Miles Away is your ultimate cars racing competition blending unique missions, extensive choice of cars and actions-packed adventures. Wait no more, pick up your car, accept the first mission and off you go! Opportunities are everywhere and the more risky, the more rewarding they will be.

name: Frupu VR Fruit Punch
description: It is an action-based fighting fun game. Monster Mu throws fruits to you. He throws faster and faster, sometimes throwing multiple fruits at once. Punch the fruit at the right time and finish your fruit cocktail or the fruit will explode in your face. Caution: Don't let the toaster hit you.

name: Meaningless
description: Solve puzzles by moving blocks to guide the ball to the exit in a minimalist 3D world. Take the time to appreciate your success; it's hypnotizing and satisfying to watch.

name: Hero Survival
description: Hero Survival is an action-roguelite where you have to shoot down hordes of monsters from classic horror movies one by one to please the Mad Time God. Choose from a variety of skills, weapons, and items to create a unique build for every bizarre character.

name: Countless Army
description: Have you ever dreamed of being the villain in a Tower Defense? Be the one who sends waves and waves of troops to break through the enemy defenses in this Reverse Tower Defense. Summon, conquer and upgrade your troops to dominate the whole world!

name: HXH
description: "HXH: Battle All One" is an action-packed fighting game. Players can choose from a variety of characters, each with their own unique fighting styles and special abilities. With fast-paced gameplay mechanics and the innovative "magic/kai" system, this game offers endless hours of entertainment.

name: Eclipsium
description: Eclipsium is a trippy and surreal horror game that will take you on a journey through darkness and confusion. In this haunting and immersive experience, you'll need to traverse a dark and twisted world to reach a tower that's looming in the distance.

name: Nyan-Nyan Punch!
description: Sin descripción

name: Burning Branch
description: Blaze a trail through a gauntlet of unique and varied bosses, in this rogue-like boss rush about smoldering want.

name: Raven: The Goblin Hunter
description: It's time to descend into the underground tunnels and defeat the Goblin King who persecutes your People! Use your weapons, prepare your spells and destroy tens of thousands of Goblins! Raven is a TPS Isometric 3D Roguelike Shooting Game. Solve the Puzzles and Hunt the Goblins!

name: Extreme Volleyball Infernal League
description: Save the world by defeating all your opponents at volleyball! (with special rules) and sending the great demon king back to its world for another millennium!

name: Fireworks Frenzy
description:
Fireworks Frenzy is a Small multiplayer fireworks game, with hundreds of fireworks and multiple maps, that tries to give you the experience and the feeling of the beautiful fireworks to blow up stuffs together.

The controls of Fireworks Frenzy are really simple. You need to simply move, pick the fireworks from the inventory and place it on the map and ignite. You can also connect, rotate and delete the placed fireworks. You can use either keyboard or controller as input device.

With Fireworks Frenzy, you'll have access to a wide variety of colorful and exciting fireworks, from sparkling fountains to booming aerial shells, all designed to help you create the most spectacular firework show possible.

There are multiple maps to pick. They are quite huge and each map is unique and you can explore the ones you like. You can also go to the moon or to Mars along with your friends to blow some fireworks and nuke Mars.

You can play fireworks frenzy either alone or with your friends. You can also customize your player character based on your preferences and unlock accessories by collecting items from the map.

With endless possibilities for creativity and exploration, it's the perfect way to light up your imagination. Fireworks Frenzy is a great game for relaxing, clearing your head for some time, and experience the magic of the fireworks in a whole new way with your friends!

name: The Sum
description: This Fallout Tactics total conversion mod aims to bring to life a plethora of anarchist utopias after global warming and other unspecified apocalyptic-like events.

name: The Strongest Tofu: Fragile Adventure
description: Be The Tofu, Be The Strong Tofu.

name: Cosmic Persecution
description: Experience both being a one man army as well as running for your life in this intense action packed platformer. Maneuver between precarious environments and equip a cosmonaut of your choice with space-era weaponry to oppose overwhelming enemy forces.

name: SpaceWorm
description: SpaceWorm is a retro arcade game where you eat stars, planets and kill space-bugs.

name: Fishbowl
description: Fishbowl is a slice of life, coming of age story told over a month. Video call loved ones, work from home, sort through puzzles to rediscover childhood memories, do care tasks and get to know yourself better, one day at a time.

name: Project Asteroids
description: I have no feelings. I have no fear. I don’t know where I am, only my aim. I must work. And I’m working. My modules are outdated, but as long as they are, I’m useful. My body is rusted, but as long as I can move, I’m useful. I’ll hold on to the stone and live. I have no feelings. I have no fear.

name: Tome of Fates
description: Tome of Fates, is a text-based interactive game like the Gamebook genre. Every decision you make has an impact and every path you take has its own rewards and risks. Experience an exciting and suspenseful journey as you explore the unknown and make the choices that will shape your fate.

name: King of Fate
description: King of Fate is based on real history, real-time strategy, real-time control, commanding famous generals to fight fiercely on the battlefield, summoning celebrities to govern the country and the people, sweeping Liuhe like the first emperor, and ruling the world, looking forward to your joining!

name: Dealership Simulator
description: Dealership Simulator is allows you to simulate a Vehicle Dealer´s Life in your Real Life while playing this game.

name: MorDobble: Spot The Match
description: Playing MorDobble is easy. You'll be presented with a set of images. Your task is to find the matching pair before your opponent does. The gameplay relies on quick reflexes and keen observation skills, rather than on knowledge or strategy, which means that everyone has an equal chance of winning.

name: CapybaRun
description: We're trying to find the items we need in a dark and scary maze and fighting against a giant creature that is chasing us!

name: That's My Space
description: The universe is yours to conquer in That's My Space. Gather resources, craft powerful weapons, upgrade your spaceship and battle against enemy nations to become the ultimate space explorer.

name: Ghoul Yeah Bunny
description: "Ghoul Yeah Bunny" As a treasure hunter stranded on Rabbit Island, solve puppet game puzzles and fight the terrifying Ghoul creature using your trusty lamp filled with rabbit lights. Find the island's 7 hidden treasures and escape to become rich in this suspenseful horror game.

name: Paradise Nowhere
description: Paradise Nowhere is a Backrooms game that blends abstract concepts with realistic graphics, evoking a feeling of liminality through empty spaces devoid of life. The game isn’t intended as a horror experience, your feelings towards liminal spaces might make it one. Or maybe, it's just the Paradise...

name: Idle Medieval Tavern
description: Once upon a time, in a realm of danger and intrigue, you find yourself entrusted with the management of a quaint medieval tavern. This captivating idle game weaves a tale of daring quests, legendary heroes, and a thriving tavern that serves as the heart of a bustling community.

name: Realm Divided
description: Realm Divided is a turn-based strategy game that offers a quick and casual board game experience while providing deep and engaging tactics. Choose one of two factions as you build and fight to conquer the map to prove your skills as a superior commander.

name: Devil Apartment
description: Hello, Jake. Welcome to the game.

name: Epochrypha
description: Epochrypha calls you and your friends to hack and slash through time as you work together to unscramble it. Choose from a band of unique warriors as you play hot-potato with unstable relics, fight through fast paced combat, and restore order to the timeline.

name: Phonk Cats
description: Play the dynamic rhythm game to the best phonk tracks! Play solo or versus your friend, customize your cats, choose different game modes - Phonk Cats are waiting for you!

name: Draikai
description: Help Bianca in Draikai, save her dragon. Face an evil scientist, discover secrets, defeat bosses, explore a pixel art world, and an amazing soundtrack. Overcome internal and external challenges in this unforgettable adventure.

name: Top Villain: Total Domination
description: How would you conquer the world? In this text-based supervillain rpg, you can vanquish your nemesis, fight heroes and villains, and find yourself!

name: Light of Coco
description: Play as Coco - a feline star creature. Use Coco's gentle meows to nurture the environment and ask your butterfly companions to assist you. Beware of the creatures lurking in the shadows.

name: Chronos Affinity
description: "A Story-Driven Extraction Based Shooter"Chronos Affinity is an ultra-realistic first person shooter. Raid, fight, loot, and grow your inventory to better prepare yourself for survival. Join now and be apart of the interactive story!

name: Wake Up
description: This game is a 3D puzzles and first-person shooter elements. Explore an office space and try to understand whether you are in a dream or in reality. Be attentive and not miss any details, as time is running out. Remember: dying in a dream means waking up, while dying in reality means simply dying.

name: Natives
description: Natives is an open-world/sandbox game with survival elements that takes place pre-Christopher Columbus. The land is raw, nature is at its peak and the seasons are full of change.

name: Greymarsh Redux
description: Greymarsh Redux is an illustrated, text-based adventure game that prioritizes atmosphere, immersion, and dialog. Step into a gritty city-state plagued by crime, poverty, and an oppressive ruler. A simple but varied battle system encourages tactical decisions and efficient inventory management.

name: Clutter RefleXIVe: The Diceman Cometh - Collector's Edition
description: By far, the most challenging and exciting Clutter ever. You will not believe the Dice, Flat-Pastel-Icons & the Abstractica Object Sets. And 3 Quests - Regular, Super-Difficult The Diceman Cometh Quest, and Super-Easy Oldschool Quest.

name: Sommerland
description: Experience the lively Land of Honey and Wine, a relaxing game where you will build villages in vibrant, atmospheric landscapes. Complete quests, explore a collection of carefully crafted maps and unlock more than 30 unique buildings in this fresh take on the city-building genre.

name: Immortal Hunters
description: Co-op RPG beat 'em up. People killed the underground god, stole his power and built a civilization ruled by the Church which is served by powerful immortal Hunters. Choose your hero, survive the apocalypse, fight, find a reborn god, expose the lies of the Cardinals.

name: WaxHeart
description: An atmospheric horror 3D platformer about a wax boy with a lantern for a heart, journeying through a dark, ruined world.

name: They're Not Monsters
description: They're Not Monsters is a real-time Roguelike where you play as a mad scientist raising and controlling commandos of mutant rabbits. Activate chips in their brains, and go reconquer your kingdom... scientifically!

name: Seeker: Quest
description: Build your ultimate team in this action-packed monster collector. Unlock dozens of playable characters, explore the planet of Naturia to obtain its loot and treasures! Engage into thrilling combat while building your village to obtain new heroes and powers for your expanding collection of Seekers.

name: Galactic Glitch
description: Galactic Glitch is a roguelike shooter, with Physics! Throw rocks, catch missiles, and rip apart your enemies - then use them as ammo! Craft your own builds from a large array of weapons and powers. Explore the far reaches of this simulated universe, become more powerful, and discover its secrets.

name: Flick Shot Rogues
description: Flick Shot Rogues is a turn-based rogue-lite that turns movement into a skill shot! Aim and flick your hero to ricochet through levels, dodge enemy attacks, and smash your foes with crazy trick shots. Featuring near-endless replayability, fun upgrades, and a ton of mayhem.

name: True Virus
description: True Virus is a point-and-click adventure game that takes players to an abandoned psychiatric hospital. Set in a world ravaged by an enigmatic and dangerous pandemic.

name: Warnament
description: A turn-based grand strategy game, simple for newbies yet challenging for masters. As the leader of a nation, you will conquer territories and advance in military, technology, culture, or politics. Choose from historical scenarios or create your own with an editor.

name: Valley of The Savage Run
description: Save the frogs from the predator. A challenging 2D pixel arcade game.

name: Tasukemono
description: A new style "strategy-like" puzzle game! Control multiple cute characters and navigate a little girl to the goal! As the girl gets deep into the forests, her secret will be revealed...

name: Horse Club Adventures: Lakeside Collection
description: Saddled, up and away! Ride together with the girls from Horse Club and discover a colorful world full of adventure and experience in the Horse Club Adventures : Lakeside Collection

name: Rise From the Ashes: A Fantasy World Simulator
description: A strategic city-building game set in a fantasy universe that allows you to create your own fantastical civilization. Define your architectural style using a building editor, customize your people, manage your city, and restore the past glory of your civilization!

name: Izio: The Pixel Kishi
description: This 2D pixel-art action game requires you to master the art of parrying to defeat your enemies.

name: Fist of the Stray Dog
description: Enter the ultimate virtual reality beat 'em up and test your martial arts skills in Fist of the Stray Dog. Experience the thrill of a dynamic combat system! Engage in intense battles against challenging opponents, using precise strikes and combos to defeat them.

name: Violet Bricks
description: Violet Bricks is an exciting puzzle game with modern 3D graphics. Help Violet defeat alien robots across dozens of challenging levels and collect power-ups to become stronger. A game that offers modernized nostalgic fun!

name: Silent Paws
description: Explore a mystical world as a clever fox in this atmospheric walking simulator.

name: The Abyss Within
description: The addictive deckbuilder roguelike. Loot, build, upgrade & repeat as you descend into the abyss

name: A Street Cat's Tale 2: Out side is Dangerous
description: A Street Cat's Tale 2 follows Cinnamon, who wanders out the window in pursuit of a butterfly. It is a Sokoban-based, narrative-led puzzle adventure game about the struggles of stray cats.

name: Super Virus Defense
description: Fight the virus in this fast paced arcade shooter with a dash of tower defense!

name: Deep Sea Rhapsody
description: This game is a game of musical rhythm, in which the player can pick up the drumsticks in the scene and beat the drums in the scene to relax rhythmically

name: Crushing Depths
description: 'Crushing Depths' is a first-person horror game set deep down on the ocean floor, you will take control of an underwater drone tasked with locating points of interest using 3D spatial sound. But be on the careful lookout for anything that may lurk down there!

name: Bit Bike
description: Mostly black and white minimalist graphics. You are a self-controlled bicycle that needs to climb difficult obstacles using your skills. Find your way to freedom.

name: Get Rich Slow
description: Welcome to Get Rich Slow, a life simulator with roguelite elements that lets you experience an entire life in a day. Make the choices that determine your character's fate and shape their story.

name: Corporate Fat Cat
description: Play the [fish] stock market as a cat trying to get out of the daily rat race.

name: Astrometica
description: Astrometica is a fun game about surviving in space. You need to use your skills and tools to stay alive. There are many challenges to face, and you need to fight to survive. You also need to build a new base in space.

name: Brainroll
description: Embark on a mind-bending adventure as Brainroll! Solve challenging puzzles in this sokoban-style game by moving brain blocks while sliding on ice. Relax in Brainroll's world, where clever thinking is the key to success. Get ready to roll your way to victory in this puzzle-packed sliding experience!

name: Indemon Tales
description: Earn the respect of a guild full of monsters and demons as a lone human by taking part in dangerous dungeon adventures and uncover secrets behind the mysterious demon kingdom of Tarborea.

name: Dreamio: AI-Powered Adventures
description: Dreamio: AI-Powered Adventures is a "choose your own adventure" game where content gets generated by AI on the fly. Story gets generated by ChatGPT, illustrations get generated by Stable Diffusion, and it uses speech synthesis for narration.

name: Honey Are You There?
description: Matthew Nate, a middle-aged man plagued with mental health problems whose home has become a site of unexplainable paranormal activity and a malevolent female entity is pursuing him to his death.

name: Chronicles of Vaeltaja: In Search of the Great Wanderer
description:
A fantasy grid-based dungeon crawler role-playing game set in the kingdom of Twin Falls, a lush and colourful world created with beautiful pixel graphics.

Chronicles of Vaeltaja: In Search of the Great Wanderer takes you back to the golden era of pc gaming, when role-playing games like Dungeon Master, Might and Magic, Eye of the Beholder, Lands of Lore, WIzardry and Ultima ruled the world. Gather your party of six adventurers and embark on a journey through the colourful kingdom of Twin Falls where sunny fields, lush forests, misty swamps and dark dungeons await to be explored!

name: Docking Ships
description: Prepare to embark on a charming and cozy puzzle adventure in Docking Ships a delightful game that combines the charm of pirate ships with the brain-teasing challenge of navigating through a grid tile system to successfully dock your vessels.

name: Red Entropy
description: 14000000000000000 years from now our sun is re-discovered by the last remains of humanity looking for any resources left in a dying universe.

name: Plunder Masters
description: Build a skilled crew of thieves in Plunder Masters, a real-time tactics game. Master heists, steal from neighbors, banks, and criminals, and use the dynamic world to your advantage by hiding and creating distractions.

name: Sublime Element
description: Sublime Element is an open-ended puzzle game where you have to build and program mechanisms to mix elements and create new ones.

name: PsychWorld
description: Export a vast procedurally generated world where you never know what you'll see next. Explore and loot a variety of structures such as the catacombs and turret towers. Slaughter enemies, grow your defenses, and escape the prison that is your mind. Just make sure you're not followed...

name: Backroom: Constructions
description: This game is a strange object where you, as a "Player" will have to construct a Backroom, but you are a human being, so getting something to eat is a task you should accomplish too,

name: High Sea Saga DX
description: Set sail and join yer crew in search of treasure and glory!

name: Store Story
description: One item shop and a huge debt to pay off. Manage your store and sell items to a diverse cast of customers. Befriend local adventurers, sell them gear, and send them on missions to bring back loot. React to the market's demands and set your own prices and in this UI driven fantasy shopkeeper game!

name: Techno Banter
description: Surrounded by bright neons, filthy streets and even filthier techno beats, it is you who guard the entrance to the rave. Sharpen your wits and deliver lyrical smackdowns to those not worthy of partying. But beware - the stakes may or may not involve blowing up the city.

name: Manitas Kitchen
description: Welcome to Manitas Kitchen, a casual cooking game with a dressing of arcade and mini-games, where you'll meet Trexito, a T-Rex with short arms that has one dream: to become the best pizza maker!

name: Astebros
description:
Choose your hero among three different characters and go through procedural dungeons to eliminate your formidable opponents!

Astebros is a roguelite game about the beginnings of the kingdom of Asteborg!
Choose your hero among three different characters and go through procedural dungeons to eliminate your formidable opponents!

Defeat bosses to obtain valuable power orbs!
Collect coins and materials to buy and upgrade your equipment!
Discover mysterious secrets within the dungeons...
All this alone or in pairs!

name: The Sandwich Making Experience
description: Welcome to The Sandwich Making Experience! The game that will have you and your friends competing for sandwich supremacy!

name: Infinite Dungeon Crawler: The Swampy Isles
description: DLC adds an additional world to travel to when you go through the Gate. Prepare yourself for a lush jungle and palm-lined beaches, filled with ancient ruins, sunken ships, and fierce monsters.

name: Fishing Adventure: Finland Reserve
description: Embark on a new fishing adventure in "Fishing Adventure: Finland Reserve"! Explore a stunning Finnish lake, catch perch, zander, pike, salmon, and brown trout as you enjoy the crystal-clear waters and breathtaking scenery. Get ready for an unforgettable experience!

name: Bonfire And Tail
description: Bonfire and Tail is a multiplayer action party game developed by avidya studio. Through the gameplay, we want to bring players back to childhood and have simple fun together. Draw a torch from the bonfire and ignite other players' tails! If your tail is on fire, wiggle it to put the fire out!

name: Pechka
description: This game portrays the tragic history of war in a 2D adventure format, set against real events. It provides a realistic experience, encompassing themes of betrayal, death, and love, while also offering multiple endings driven by player choices. Discover the impact of this era's tragedy firsthand

name: Cabernet
description: Cabernet is a 2D narrative RPG set in 19th century Eastern Europe. Guide Liza, a young vampire struggling with her morality and the supernatural world she has been pulled into. Beware, the taste of Cabernet is not for the faint of heart - prepare to explore themes of social conflict, alcoholism, and corruption.

name: The Soul Box: Don Quixotes of Tomorrow
description: An (in)side story that sheds some light on El Capitan's past and the others' present.

name: Corpse Master
description: In Corpse Master, Raven must face endless hordes of demons and monsters to find and destroy the 3 fragments of the Corpse Master, with the help of special weapons, random and specific items and a lot of skill.

name: Alan Wake II: Deluxe Edition
description:
Alan Wake II: Deluxe Edition is a special edition of Alan Wake II.

It includes:
- Digital base game
- Expansion Pass
- Night Springs Expansion (additional story content)
- Lake House Expansion (additional story content)
- Crimson Windbreaker for Saga
- Celebrity Suit for Alan
- Classic Alan Wake Outfit for Alan
- Parliament Shotgun Skin for Alan
- Lantern Charm for Saga

name: Forum Mortuorum
description: Your gladiator school awaits you. You decide whom to hire, which matches to fight, and how to equip and train your gladiators. Set tactics for your gladiators, then throw them into the arena for fame and profit. Advance through the leagues, conquer great foes, and emblazon your name upon history.

name: Astra Noctis
description: Astra Noctis is a Metroidvania more focused on combat than exploration. It contains some RPG touches, such as the inventory and equipment system. These systems encourage experimentation and the creation of different builds and playstyles.

name: Bore Blasters
description: Blast through rocks with your machine gun drill. Collect rare gems, ores and ancient artifacts, upgrade your ship and unlock new abilities. Uncover the mysteries of the deep and the dangers that lurk below.

name: Primal Rift
description: Turn-based, solo character roleplaying adventure set in a prehistoric world!

name: GoKaDu
description: GoKaDu is a retro simulator of a role-playing card game of the 80s - "Govno". Play cards with the ghosts of GoKaDu castle, use the game chat and enjoy the mystical atmosphere of this amazing game. The game has rude profanity and a lot of joy and fun.

name: Spiral Up
description: An extremely challenging 2D Platformer made by a bunch of Jump King lovers: breach the sky, or torture yourself, with spring and gravity. Can also be played with your friends, either for a race or for co-op.

name: Palladium
description: A classical FPS based on movement filled with metroidvania elements and power ups to find by exploring the interconnected levels.

name: HexBat
description: Challenge your Friends in this Free turn-based, chess-like strategy game with Healers, Rogues, Archers, and more! Create your own Hexagon Grids for near endless variation.

name: Casting Whispers
description: Casting Whispers is a story-driven first-person horror mystery in the fictional New England industrial city of Corburgh. Investigate the run-down apartment building that your mentor seems to have vanished in, while an alien interdimensional being vies for your attention and, possibly, your life.

name: Lost In The Shadows
description: Become the hero who will be the first to defeat the toughest enemies of the dungeon. Develop your character to become indestructible. You can gain levels, distribute points and upgrade your abilities.

name: A Thug's Ascension
description: A Thug's Ascension is a low-poly action-adventure / FPS story set in the dying city of Maratha, circa 2023. Become Chief, a feared mercenary, and experience a dark, slow-paced, character-driven crime drama marrying cinematic dialogue-driven storytelling with intense shooting and driving gameplay.

name: Garden of Pizzlerat
description: Welcome to [Game Title], a terrifying indie horror/Puzzle game that will have you on the edge of your seat! You play as [Protagonist], who finds themselves trapped in a [Location] filled with danger and terror. Use your [Gimmick mechanic] to find your way out!

name: The RPG
description: An RPG-lite adventure with intentionally twisted traditional role-playing games aspects, where your choices do matter.

name: Schrott
description: SCHROTT - the roguelite driving game: Pull off insane stunts, collect valuable loot, and customize your absurd vehicle.

name: Rebirth Evolution
description: 2D pixel style simulation business strategy game Build and operate your own survivor base, recruit and cultivate various professional combatants. Clear zombie strongholds, reduce regional infections, survive in the apocalypse, and establish your own power.

name: Snowboard League
description: Snowboard League is an exciting snowboarding game where you customize your character and compete in thrilling races with power-ups. Earn coins to unlock more customization options and enjoy endless hours of fun.

name: Chicken Cluck Cluck!
description: In this humorously plotted point-and-click adventure game, fool around as a chicken by swallowing items and laying them back as eggs! Solve funny riddles, find ways to enter locked rooms, and talk to funny animals, enjoyable with an original hand-animated style!

name: Liminal Space
description: Welcome to Liminal Space. We have been expecting you. Choose your map and try to escape. It's up to you if you want monsters chasing you or if you want a peaceful experience with no threats. With an unsettling soundtrack and fun graphic options, you'll have a good time for a cheap price.

name: Arcane Survivors
description: Arcane Passage is a rogue light action game that takes you into dungeons to explore magic. Choose a class, combine spells and runes, and master the art of magic.

name: Pixel Cafe
description: Join a small-town girl on this coming-of-age story about family, relationships, coffee and life in the big city. Immerse yourself in the perfect blend of an arcade-style time manager and visual novel, exploring dual storylines and a beautifully crafted pixel art world in Pixel Cafe.

name: Operator
description: In Operator, you will play as an elite "Tier 1" operator undergoing dangerous clandestine operations all over the globe. With a strategic, measured, and unforgiving style of gameplay. You are the tactical advantage, Good luck.

name: The Mystery Of The Moon
description: The game of survival and construction on the surface of the moon. Learn to build a base on the surface of the moon, maintain survival, explore and discover the secrets inside the moon, and solve abnormal problems.

name: Reus 2
description: Shape humanity with the power of the gods in Reus 2. Choose your giants, combine natural elements, and manipulate fate to guide the path of civilization. The choices are yours, and so are the consequences.

name: Isop0dyssey
